name: Chicken Scampi II
author: CYNDEE1942
summary: All the flavor and taste of shrimp scampi! Serve over rice or with spaghetti. Do not forget to serve with crusty rolls or bread to sop up the sauce! Enjoy!
ingredients: 4  breast half, bone and skin removed (blank)s boneless chicken breast halves, sliced lengthwise into thirds
directions: In a large skillet, heat the butter and oil over medium high until the butter melts
Add the parsley, basil, oregano and garlic and salt and mix together in the skillet
Then add the chicken and saute for about 3 minutes or until white
Lower the heat and cook for about 10 to 15 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and the juices run clear
More butter can be added if needed
